data.what_is:
For any business to succeed, it has to generate quality leads. That will only happen when the sales and marketing teams relentlessly pursue every hot trail at their disposal until such a time when it is converted.

Unfortunately, human beings have finite faculties when it comes to chasing down every conceivable lead. If only there was some tool to aid and assist with the process, making the lives of the professionals easier.

Today, powerful AI solutions are capable of diligently pursuing persons-of-interest on behalf of sales and marketing teams and convey the business proposition in an effective fashion.
Furthermore, they can optimize their mode of communication so as to maximize the chances of conversion. This includes email, social media messaging, SMS, old-fashioned handwritten notes and even voice calls.

ZOE Cadence allows you to use multiple channels to communicate with your prospects. You can select which modes of communication to use and how often.

You can program ZOE Cadence to reach out to your prospect using the channel of your choice. You can also dictate in what order and frequency channels will be deployed.

Many uninitiated marketers often argue that ZOE Cadence doesn't really bring anything new to the table. What can ZOE Cadence do that a simple email or text messaging campaign cannot?
ZOE Cadence is powered by conversational AI. This means that, unlike any ordinary market communication activity, it is equipped with Natural Language Processing (NLP) and machine learning.

It can not only reach out to your prospects but can also intelligently converse with them. If your prospects reciprocate to your follow-ups, ZOE Cadence can respond to their queries or remarks. It can also schedule meetings depending upon the itinerary of your business interests.

Last but not least, ZOE Cadence can transfer any follow-up activity to a human sales or marketing executive when the lead has matured and is ready to convert into a paying customer.
data.product_description: ZOE Cadence serves the invaluable purpose of automating the crucial business development activity of follow-ups. This frees up an enormous amount of time for sales and marketing personnel to devote their knowledge and experience to more challenging tasks.
data.supported_languages: German, English, French, Irish, Italian, Dutch, Spanish

initial_reviews.review_title: Best Al tool to manage everything
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ZOE Cadence?
It AI is good and we can automate lots of things with this app.

What do you dislike about ZOE Cadence?
It AI can be improved more like it can capture meeting notes and individual AI.

What problems is ZOE Cadence solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automate lots of things that takes lot of time and efforts.
